note.p: Russian-born British wine merchant. Also known as John Krohn. In 1858, together with his brother Nicolai (or Nicholas), founded the wine producing and exporting firm of Krohn Brothers & Co. in Madeira. Married Elizabeth Husband Grant in Madeira in 1866. Naturalised British citizen, 1885.
